sentence.Network_en: The domes are circular or ovoid in cross - section .

sentence.Network_en: The shapes of neuronal cell bodies are spherical, ovoid, pyramial, fusiform, stellate or crescentic.
sentence.Network_cn: 神经元细胞体的形状有圆形, 卵圆形, 锥形, 梭形, 星形或半月形.

sentence.Network_en: Fruit ovoid, 2 - 2.5 cm long, persistent calyx 1 - 1.3 cm long.
sentence.Network_cn: 果卵形, 长2-2.5厘米,宿萼长1-1.3厘米.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French ovoïde, from modern Latin ovoides, from Latin ovum 'egg'

auth_sentence.content: Outside Norwich, a huge pillar, topped by an ovoid urn, suddenly came into view, in a field by the side of the road.
